name: tasktasker
description: TaskTasker - Tree-based task management web app

scripts.build: npm --prefix apps/web install --no-audit --no-fund && npm --prefix apps/web run build
scripts.preview: cd apps/web && npx opennextjs-cloudflare build && npx opennextjs-cloudflare preview
scripts.deploy: cd apps/web && npx opennextjs-cloudflare build && npx opennextjs-cloudflare deploy
scripts.cf-typegen: cd apps/web && npx wrangler types --env-interface CloudflareEnv cloudflare-env.d.ts
